newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends 0.27 lower at 995.92.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends 0.27 lower at 995.92.

text.p: Colombia's peso ended 0.27 centavo lower at 995.92 per dollar on sporadic demand for dollars from the corporate sector, interbank dealers said.

"There was some demand (for dollars) from corporate sector businesses making wire transfers abroad but it was mostly counteracted by export revenues," a dealer said of the peso's slight move downward.
It was the third consecutive day that the peso, which has risen sharply since late June when it was trading at more than 1,070 to the dollar, edged down against the U.S. currency.
Dealers reported 307 trades in Wednesday's session for a total of $162 million and said the peso held in a range of 995.90 to 996.65.
